welcome.title: Welcome to LyricSync
welcome.signIn: Sign in to save your setlists and unlock all features!
welcome.desc: Organize your favorite songs, craft setlists, and perform with confidence.
welcome.descShort: Combine lyrics, chords, create setlists, and play songs for every occasion
welcome.welcomeText: An app for adding or finding lyrics, creating and managing setlists, and displaying live lyrics while performing music. Easy to use solo or in a team, catering to all music genres and user groups.

longDesc: LyricSync combines lyrics, chords, setlists, and your favorite songs for every occasion. Supports auto-scroll, player, and song sharing for everyone.
